amendment.description: Amendment sought to redirect $10 million in funding for ICE to incorporate body-worn cameras.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 75 printed in Part B of House Report 115-292 to increase funding for ICE to incorporate body-worn cameras.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castro (TX) amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 203 - 211 (Roll no. 461).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Castro (TX) amendment (A039) Failed by recorded vote: 203 - 211 (Roll no. 461).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. Castro (TX).
